title: FS T205 Sovereign Mathewson PSA 4 (New grade)
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: FS T205 Sovereign Mathewson PSA 4 (New grade)
posts.post_content: Great looking card here with very little of the typical border chipping and great centering with a tough Sovereign back.  $4599. net to me insured and delivered to you.  I collect sales tax in NY, NJ and PA.

That's a pretty card. Good luck...
.
